FuncDef:
The segment-list command creates a candidate path for an SRv6 TE Policy and displays the segment list view.
The undo segment-list command deletes a segment list.
By default, no SRv6 TE Policy candidate path is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the segment list name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The segment-list command creates a segment list for an SRv6 TE Policy so that the segment list can be referenced by a candidate path of the SRv6 TE Policy.
